name: Evoke (itch)
description:
Controls - 
E - Interact
A & D - Move left or right
Space - Close Dialogue

This game was made specifically during and for the Senscape Cursed Game Jam that took place from October 14th, 2022 - October 31st, 2022. We used all original art assets, design, and sound to form this game ourselves in two weeks. 

Corey Parsley - Narrative Design, Coding, and Level Design

Kira Binda - Art and Character Design, Sound/Music Design.

This game is a proof of concept for a more finished game down the line. This was our first ever game jam and our first ever game we created together! With that said, we hope you enjoy what we've created so far!

Warmest Regards,

Radioactive Beans
